history.content:
We recently launched a new stealth startup based on our research in the RISE Lab. We are commercializing cutting edge research in prediction serving pipelines, distributed machine learning, and serverless computing to enable deep integration of machine learning into all aspects of a business. This is a big task and we need your help!

We are looking for full-stack engineers (both full-time employees and part-time interns) who will help build out new UI workflows for operationalizing ML, design elegant python data APIs, and implement advanced cross-cloud autoscaling infrastructure.  If this sounds exciting, email jobs@spiralai.co and we can tell you more about what we are doing and how you can get involved.

Go Bears!

Joey
history.subject: Cal startup looking for early engineers
